      Returns the CreativeTab to display the given block on.

    • net.minecraft.client.gui.inventory中CreativeTabs的使用

      参数类型为CreativeTabs的net.minecraft.client.gui.inventory中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      protected void GuiContainerCreative.drawTab​(CreativeTabs tab)
      Draws the given tab and its background, deciding whether to highlight the tab or not based off of the selected index.
      protected boolean GuiContainerCreative.isMouseOverTab​(CreativeTabs tab, int mouseX, int mouseY)
      Checks if the mouse is over the given tab.
      protected boolean GuiContainerCreative.renderCreativeInventoryHoveringText​(CreativeTabs tab, int mouseX, int mouseY)
      Renders the creative inventory hovering text if mouse is over it.

    • net.minecraft.item中CreativeTabs的使用

      返回CreativeTabs的net.minecraft.item中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      CreativeTabs Item.getCreativeTab()
      gets the CreativeTab this item is displayed on
      CreativeTabs ItemBanner.getCreativeTab()
      gets the CreativeTab this item is displayed on
      CreativeTabs ItemBlock.getCreativeTab()
      gets the CreativeTab this item is displayed on
      CreativeTabs[] Item.getCreativeTabs()
      Gets a list of tabs that items belonging to this class can display on, combined properly with getSubItems allows for a single item to span many sub-items across many tabs.
      参数类型为CreativeTabs的net.minecraft.item中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void Item.getSubItems​(CreativeTabs tab, NonNullList<ItemStack> items)
